siteMetadata.title: Thoughts on Software Development, Product, Data, Leadership, Entreprenuership and being Human
siteMetadata.description: A personal blog, mostly for myself, but open to the world. Mostly reflections of the past and notes for the future in effort to increase awareness of how invaluable time is spent well, traded fairly and wasted often. I'm 30 years old with 20+ games built, 5+ products shipped, 7 startups made and 20 years of coding.
siteMetadata.author: Joseph Cooper
